item.title: DevOps at scale: GitHub
item.description: When you speak about DevOps at scale, being SOC (Service Organization Control) 2 compliant and dealing with hundreds or more projects and engineers, it’s nearly impossible to impart so called “DevOps culture” without putting together team-wide standard practices & policies. So below are few DevOps practices we follow when we select a candidate application or service for our DevOps onboarding. Git the single source of truth Git is a distributed version-control system for tracking changes in source code during software development.

item.title: GitHub Auto Tagger
item.description: I keep track of all my development work using GitHub project boards. It not only helps me to see where work is flowing, queued or stalled but also to make our work visible and transparent as possible. To simplify, automate & improve GitHub issue management workflow therefore to scratch my own itch, I made a simple GitHub Probot app autotagger. It automatically tags the GitHub Issues based on the matched pattern.
